description: Demolition of block H83, ESMI Unit, and redevelopment to provide a total of 59 residential flats incorporating the conversion of block H11 to provide 11 flats (10 x 2 bed flats and 1 x 1 bed flat) and erection of 4 new blocks comprising 48 flats (6 x 1 bed, 42 x 2 bed), access, parking arrangements and associated works.
